titleStmt.title: VVits bedlam ----vvhere is had, whipping-cheer, to cure the mad.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, and are to be sould by Iames Dauies, at the Red Crosse nere Fleete-streete Conduit,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf contains an apology for errors.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Red Crosse nere Fleete-streete Conduit
